metadata.name: Tranquillity
metadata.description:
In this painting I merge woman and flowers together to convey the message of beauty of nature within them. 
As both are beautiful, sensitive, strong and colourful.
Take care of women as you take care of flowers. If you don't they will die from inside showing on the outside.
All rights reserved 2022 Elham Release Date: 23/01/2022
Mixed Media on canvas.
